title: Blessings for new PM from Walukaramaya and Gangaramaya
body_lines: The new Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe yesterday soon after his swearing in received blessings from the Walukaramaya and Gangaramaya in Colombo. Here the Premier is seen engaged in religious observances – Pix by Upul Abayasekara and Pradeep Pathirana
